GeDBIT.index

类 KNearestNeighborQuery

  • java.lang.Object
    • GeDBIT.index.KNearestNeighborQuery
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Query

    public class KNearestNeighborQuery
extends java.lang.Object
implements Query
    Given a query object and k, return the k points in the database with the smallest disances to the query.
    版本:
    2006.05.09
    作者:
    Rui Mao, Willard

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明

      Initializes the range query object

      Returns the k.

      • KNearestNeighborQuery

        public KNearestNeighborQuery(IndexObject center,
                     int k)
        Initializes the range query object
        参数:
        center - the Object that serves as the query object
        radius - the search radius of the range query.
